title: SOLD: T206 Jack Chesbro SGC 4 VG-EX...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Jack Chesbro SGC 4 VG-EX...
posts.post_content:
Nicely centered portrait card of "Happy" Jack Chesbro.  There is a slight WST on the reverse.  The price is $SOLD, net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S.  Tax free.  :o

I also have T206s of Fred Clarke (portait) and Vic Willis (throwing) for sale if interested.

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]
Man to me that's a near perfect T206. Beautiful.
